title: hey mastery token towards level 7 I have a question!
body: I have been getting rank S with Varus my past games and still no token. I just played one now and got an S. And still no token. Please I'm not understanding why this is happening. You can look up the match history and clearly see I earned the s but got no token. Please help. (and no I'm not seeing things I'm actually getting S's.

replies.body:
From looking into your account, it appears that you have been recently punished by our Player Behavior systems for your behavior in-game.  This actually disqualifies you from earning Hextech loot after matches, which includes mastery tokens.  You can read more in-depth about this in our [Hextech Restrictions Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463).

I hope this alleviates some confusion, let me know if you have any other questions.

While I understand why banned/punished players don't get to have extra goodies, why is this applicable to champion mastery? His ability to play the champion (and getting great scores) has no bearing on his in-game attitude. Why is champion mastery gated both by hextech crafting AND player behavior? This system doesn't seem to be representative of players' skills with a champion and there isn't an explanation as to why it was arbitrarily designed that way.

I know this was 10 days ago but you're wrong... I was getting s-'s. I got an S that same night and got a token so no I was not punished...
